com.meterware.httpunit
Class HeaderOnlyWebRequest

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.meterware.httpunit.WebRequest
        |
        +--com.meterware.httpunit.HeaderOnlyWebRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetMethodWebRequest, HeadMethodWebRequest
public abstract class HeaderOnlyWebRequest
extends WebRequest

A web request which has no information in its message body.

Author:
Russell Gold
